channel.title: DJ Joolz - Soulful House, Deep House & Jackin House
channel.description: Various progressive mixes from Soulful, Deep, Jackin, to Deep Tech & Tribal House Music - plus a couple of Deep blue FM radio shows. I hope you enjoy them x
channel.itunes:subtitle: Various progressive House music mixes from Soulful House, Deep House, Jackin to Deep Tech & Tribal House Music
channel.itunes:author: Joolz Barker
channel.itunes:summary: Various progressive mixes from Soulful, Deep, Jackin, to Deep Tech & Tribal House Music - plus a couple of Deep blue FM radio shows. I hope you enjoy them x

item.title: DJ Joolz - Soulful House Mix 3
item.description: DJ Joolz - Soulful House Mix 3. A big thank you to all of the producers for creating such amazing music! Neil Pierce, Sy Sez, Aaron Ross, Groove Assasin, James Blaksta John, First Choice, Bas Amro, Random Soul, Rude Disco & Eliki, Sasha Alazy, Captain T and all the amazing vocalists. All tracks are available to purchase from www.traxsource.com I hope you enjoy, much love, Joolz xxx TRACKLIST:: Track 1 – Sweet Kisses (Nastee Nev Mix) - Rude Disco & Eliki ------- Track 2 – Perfect Love (Dario M´s Beachside Mix) - Capital T feat. Taymah ------- Track 3 – More (More Mix) - Samba & Ronilo Feat Kadija Kamara ------- Track 4 – Smile (Original) - James Blakstar John feat. Deon Nathan ------- Track 5 – In My Mind (Ospina and Oscar P D.O.O.P. Remix) - Sasha Alazy feat. Mel------- Track 6 – Hypnotize Me (Jay-j's Shifted Up Mix) - Random Soul ------- Track 7 – Love and Happiness (New Ray Jones Mixe) (Ray Jones Vocal Mix) - First Choice------ Track 8 - Soundkilla - Bas Amro ------- Track 9 – Workout / Trinidad (Workout (Dub Mix)) - Groove Assasin ------- Track 10 – Love Therapy (Sy Sez Dub) – Neil Pierce feat. Adeola Shyllon ------- Track 11 – Alive (Dub) - Aaron Ross and Sterling Ensemble feat. Ursula Rucker ------- Track 12 – Keep It Simple (Original) – Lil Mark-----

item.title: DJ Joolz - Soulful House Mix 2
item.description: A deep and soulful mix of beautiful vocals. Many thanks for the producers for giving us such amazing music! Big thank you to Sy Sez & Gavin Peters of the AphroDisiax, Sabrina Chyld, Neil Pierce, Shea Soul, Black Coffee and Rasmus Faber to name but a few. All tracks are available to buy from: http://www.traxsource.com. Please share the love. Many thanks, Joolz :) xxx Tracklist:--- 1) Never Saw You Coming (DJ Spinna Galactic Soul Mix) - Black Coffee Featuring Tsepo.--- 2) Slip Away (Nauts L8 Nite Dub) - AphroDisiax & Afronaut feat. Sabrina Chyld.--- 3) Perfectly (The Layabouts Vocal Mix) - The Layabouts feat. Shea Soul.--- 4) Give It To Me (Hardsoul Reconstruction) - Rasmus Faber feat. Dyanna Fearon.--- 5) Sweet Times (2011 Rework) - Hector Couto.--- 6) Hard Yards - Domsko feat Astral T.--- 7) Into You (Ray Jones Mix) - Danny Clark & Jay Benham feat. Carla Prather.--- 8) Without Your Love (Incl. DJ Spinna, Tomson & Benedict and Love Over Money Mixes) (DJ Spinna Galactic Soul Vocal Mix) - Tone Control ft. James B. Coleman.--- 9) Crazy (Incl. Quentin Harris & Culoe De Song Mixes) (Original) - Black Coffee feat. Thiwe.--- 10) Relish Your Soul (Soul Heaven Vox) - Neil Pierce ft. Kadija Kamara.--- 11) Yes (Original Mix) - Rasmus Faber feat. Dyanna Fearon.--- 12) Star (Rocco & Rasmus Faber Remixes) (Rocco Underground Mix) - Reel People feat. Tony Momrelle.---

item.title: DJ Joolz - Soulful House Mix
item.description: A Mix of beautiful, vocal and soulful tracks. Many thanks to the producers for these amazing tracks. All tracks are available from http://www.traxsource.com TRACKLIST: Track 1 - It's Hard - Restless Soul Fun Band Track 2 - What It Feels Like - (Classic Mix) - Arnaud D Track 3 - Caterpillar - (Atjazz Remix) - Amana Melome Track 4 - Chasing Part 1 (Atjazz Remix) - C.9ine feat. Kholi Track 5 - Troubled Waters (Muthafunkaz Vocal) - Sybil Track 6 - Brighter Days (Deep Journey Main Mix) - Rancido feat. Lex Empress Track 7 - Devils (Knockin' On My Window) (Main Vocal Mix) - DJ Spinna & Amanda Diva Track 8 - The L Word Feat. Jada (Original Mix) - Deniz Kurtel Track 9 - First To Say Goodbye (Rocco Deep Mix) - DJ Micks feat. Robin Latimore Track 10 - Found My Light - Imaani - The_Layabouts_Vocal_Mix I hope you enjoy this mix as much as I did putting it together. Love, Peace and House Beatz xx Many thanks to Dimitris Koutroumpas for the Photography used on the Cover. http://www.wearequixotic.com

item.title: DJ Joolz Presents - SY SEZ - Master Tempo Mix
item.description: Another amazing, beautiful Soulful guest mix from the one and only SY SEZ - DJ/Producer & Radio Host - Master Tempo Mix. April 2011. Tracklist: 1. Systemfunk Feat. Aqeel - Destiny (Atjazz Love Soul Remix)/ 2. Nick Doe Feat. Louise Golbey - He Loves Me / 3. MdCL feat. Ovasoul7 - Feels Like Home / 4. Mr. Cee feat. Mind Games - Pain (Original)/ 5. Black Coffee feat. Hugh Masekela - We Are One (Black Coffee Original Demo Mix)/ 6. Nkhagy - Life/ 7. DJ Hypnosis - The Harmony V Halo - DJ Le Roi ft Chappell Get Ready Accapella / 8. Warm Days feat. Swindle and Natalie Maddix Selfish Skies (Atjazz Remix) / 9. Magnetic Man feat. John Legend - Getting Nowhere (Yoruba Soul Remix)/ 10. Muzzaik feat.Zaida - Work It (N'Dinga Gaba Mix)/ 11. Ziggy Funk Feat. Taliwa - Everyday (Yass Classic Mix)//////// I know your gonna enjoy this! Please share the Love. Joolz xxxx

item.title: DJ Joolz - Deep and Soulful House Mix
item.description: A progressive mix of deep and soulful vocal house, some lovely phat basslines! I hope you enjoy the mix, Love, Peace and House beatz. Joolz xx Tracklist: 1) Look What (J&M Bros) / Javi Lopez 2) Snatches / Karol XVII & MB Valence 3) Come Back / The House Inspectors feat Adaja 4) My Revolution (Toka Project Evolution Mix) / The Sound Diggers 5) Close To The Trama EP (Incl. Karizma Remixes) (Jovonn feat. Hosanna 4) Littlebird - Don't Get Too Close) /Jovonn 6) My City (Alexkid) / Alland Byallo 7) Complicated (DJ Christos Afro Deep Mix) / Ralf GUM feat. Kafele 8) Kama Sutra / Ross Couch 9) No Place Like Home / Thomas De Lorenzo 10) Just Sing (Incl. Muthafunkaz Mixes) (MuthaFunkaz Mix) / Distant People 11) Im Deep / Rotty 12) Back In School / The Timewriter 13) Sunstar (Garnica) / Pablo Sanchez

item.title: DJ Joolz Presents: SY SEZ - STRICTLY 4 THE LOVE MIX - Nov 2010
item.description: A fantastic guest Mix from the one and only SY SEZ of the Aphrodisiax. Remember this cats name, with his unique style of Deep, Soulful, Gospel Afro-Beat and Latin house - he has a serious love for the music he plays, and his passion shines through in any of the sets you will hear him play. Also check out some of the wicked productions from Sy Sez and Gavin Peters of the Aphrodisiax on www.traxsource.com You can catch Sy live on colourful radio for his for my unique style of Deep, Soulful, Gospel Afro-Beat and Latin house. On air Thursdays (21:00); GMT: http://www.colourfulradio.com/presenter/sysez/ A true inspiration! Many thanks Sy, big love, Joolz xx Track List: Track 1: Colonel Abrams - Trapped - Accapella Track 2: Osunlade presents Nadirah Shakoor - Pride Track 3: Hillya - I know Track 4: The Layabouts feat. Shea Soul - Perfectly Track 5: Jon Oudo feat. Ann Browne - Cant Stop Believing Track 6: DJ Le Roi feat. Andrea Love - Let It Feel Good Track 7: Musaria feat. Saturna - Moment (Atjazz Mix) Track 8: Black Magic - Freedom (Color 4 Frankie's Dub) Track 9: The Reese Project feat. Rachel Kapp - Human (HHA Edit) Track 10: Ewonder Records feat. Lynn Lockamy - Torture Track 11: SuSu Bobien - I Got My Pride (Davidson Ospina Anthem) Track 12: Inaya Day & Ralf Gum - Lose My Worries (MuthaFunkaz Mix) Track 13: Phyre Hawkins - Think About You Track 14: The RAH Band - Messages From The Stars (Atjazz Remix) Sy Sez is a London DJ whos journey began playing on many of Londons pirate radio stations. Along with his radio shows he began playing at local house & warehouse parties, since then he has graced many of Londons best club venues including Ministry of Sound, Turnmills, Pacha, Neighbourhood, Herbal, The Key, KOKO, Canvas, SE1, Plan-B, The Whitehouse - aswell as other clubs in UK cities such as Bristol, Nottingham, Exeter, Bournemouth, Southampton and Newquay. Since then he has also travelled to Ibiza, France, Southern Spain and Ireland to showcase his talent. In 2005 Sy Sez caught the eye of infamous house-music duo ‘The Fanatix’ (Aaron Ross & Neil Pierce) and earned him a place on their monthly residencies at top London venue – Neighbourhood. This notorious residency was a very popular night and created a dedicated following and has now been moved to Herbal - where he continues to be their resident. Due to his continued hardwork, dedication and talent - Sy was then proudly welcomed into the Fanatix as their official 3rd member and to begin joining them in the studio on their productions. Soon after his baptism in production with the Fanatix Sy teamed up with fellow london DJ - Gavin Peters and formed the production outfit AphroDisiax - who are now begininng to create interest with their productions and remixes! In 2007 his DJ skills earned him a place on the Soul-Heaven lineup on its return to the Ministry of Sound featuring Terry Hunter & Terissa Griffin and also a repeat booking at Soul Heaven for Tony Humphries 50th Birthday.....2 great parties later and Sy was asked to join the heavy-weight in-house lineup as a full Soul Heaven resident ! Also, bookings from soulful house legends Bobby & Steve playing at their famous club night GARAGE CITY (a true soulful house institution) and new residencies for Kinky Malinki + Stereo Sushi confirm Sy as one of the UKs brightest young stars.
item.dc:creator: Joolz Barker
item.itunes:summary:
A fantastic guest Mix from the one and only SY SEZ of the Aphrodisiax.
Remember this cats name, with his unique style of Deep, Soulful, Gospel Afro-Beat and Latin house - he has a serious love for the music he plays, and his passion shines through in any of the sets you will hear him play.
Also check out some of the wicked productions from Sy Sez and Gavin Peters of the Aphrodisiax on www.traxsource.com
You can catch Sy live on colourful radio for his for my unique style of Deep, Soulful, Gospel Afro-Beat and Latin house. On air Thursdays (21:00); GMT: http://www.colourfulradio.com/presenter/sysez/
A true inspiration! Many thanks Sy, big love, Joolz xx
Track List:
Track 1: Colonel Abrams - Trapped - Accapella Track 2: Osunlade presents Nadirah Shakoor - Pride Track 3: Hillya - I know Track 4: The Layabouts feat. Shea Soul - Perfectly Track 5: Jon Oudo feat. Ann Browne - Cant Stop Believing Track 6: DJ Le Roi feat. Andrea Love - Let It Feel Good Track 7: Musaria feat. Saturna - Moment (Atjazz Mix) Track 8: Black Magic - Freedom (Color 4 Frankie's Dub) Track 9: The Reese Project feat. Rachel Kapp - Human (HHA Edit) Track 10: Ewonder Records feat. Lynn Lockamy - Torture Track 11: SuSu Bobien - I Got My Pride (Davidson Ospina Anthem) Track 12: Inaya Day & Ralf Gum - Lose My Worries (MuthaFunkaz Mix) Track 13: Phyre Hawkins - Think About You Track 14: The RAH Band - Messages From The Stars (Atjazz Remix)
Sy Sez is a London DJ whos journey began playing on many of Londons pirate radio stations. Along with his radio shows he began playing at local house & warehouse parties, since then he has graced many of Londons best club venues including Ministry of Sound, Turnmills, Pacha, Neighbourhood, Herbal, The Key, KOKO, Canvas, SE1, Plan-B, The Whitehouse - aswell as other clubs in UK cities such as Bristol, Nottingham, Exeter, Bournemouth, Southampton and Newquay. Since then he has also travelled to Ibiza, France, Southern Spain and Ireland to showcase his talent.
In 2005 Sy Sez caught the eye of infamous house-music duo ‘The Fanatix’ (Aaron Ross & Neil Pierce) and earned him a place on their monthly residencies at top London venue – Neighbourhood. This notorious residency was a very popular night and created a dedicated following and has now been moved to Herbal - where he continues to be their resident. Due to his continued hardwork, dedication and talent - Sy was then proudly welcomed into the Fanatix as their official 3rd member and to begin joining them in the studio on their productions.
Soon after his baptism in production with the Fanatix Sy teamed up with fellow london DJ - Gavin Peters and formed the production outfit AphroDisiax - who are now begininng to create interest with their productions and remixes!
In 2007 his DJ skills earned him a place on the Soul-Heaven lineup on its return to the Ministry of Sound featuring Terry Hunter & Terissa Griffin and also a repeat booking at Soul Heaven for Tony Humphries 50th Birthday.....2 great parties later and Sy was asked to join the heavy-weight in-house lineup as a full Soul Heaven resident !
Also, bookings from soulful house legends Bobby & Steve playing at their famous club night GARAGE CITY (a true soulful house institution) and new residencies for Kinky Malinki + Stereo Sushi confirm Sy as one of the UKs brightest young stars.

item.title: DJ Joolz - Oh So Soulful House Mix
item.description: An Uplifting, Vocal Soulful House Mix. I hope you enjoy it! Big Love to Sy Sez & Gavin Peters of the Afrodisiax, Phil Asher, Sean McCabe and all the other producers of such wonderful music! All tracks available from http://www.traxsource.com Tracklist: Track 1: Little Bird (DJ Spinna Remixes) (Dub) - Matthew Bandy & Aphrodisiax feat Adeola Ranson Track 2: SOMEONE feat. KAYENNE (Version) - Phil Asher and Kai Alce Track 3: Work Me Over (Afro Jam Vocal Mix) - John Oudo feat Junior + Adeola Ranson & Ann Browne Track 4: No Limit (Incl. Mr. V & Reelsoul Mixes) (Nathan G Back 2 Luvbug Vocal) - Nathan G & Blackfrog feat. Byron Stingily Track 5: A Little More Love (Main Vocal Mix) - Sean McCabe & Adeola Ranson Track 6: Family (Roots Alt Dub)- Blaze Track 7: Reach Inside (Sean McCabe Vocal Mix)- Bah Samba Track 8: The Jaffa Music EP (Incl. Yass & Ralf Gum Mixes) (Rachel Claudio - Freedom (Raw Artistic Soul Remix) Track 9: Let It Fall (Harlum Mix)- Lady Alma and The Rainmakers

item.title: DJ Joolz - Deep Tribal Uplifting House
item.description:
An energetic, progressive, uplifting, deep tech, tribal Mix with some big phat basslines, and wicked vocals that get you all duckie bumps! I hope you enjoy this mix as much as I did putting it together. Thank you to all the Producers that give us beautiful music to lift our souls and a big thank you to everybody that supports Producers and DJ's and feels and shows their love. God bless y'all, Joolz x Track Listing Track 1 - Hanging on a string - The MuthaFunkaz (Miami Mix) Track 2 - Melchyor A's Hmida Remix - NYC Peech Boys Track 3 - I - Deep Zone feat Ceybil Jefferies Track 4 - Omorp - (Catz N Dogz First Minute Remix) Track 5 - Mantra (Original Mix)- Juan Kidd vs Prok & Fitch Track 6 - MOA (Main Mix) - Luis Radio & Raffa Track 7 - The Sun EP (Burujava (Original Vibes Mix) - Stefano Noferini Track 8 - Vem Rebola (Part 2) (YS Main Mix) - DJ Gregory Track 9 - Carnavalesco (Original InStereo Mix) - DJ Chus & Supernova Track 10 - Fight Back (Mike Dunn's Hookum Mixx)- DJ Garphie & The Desolate One Feat. Marie Tweek Track 11 - Spells of Yoruba - Gel Abril - (Kaytronik Remix) Track 12 - Underground Collective in Colombia EP (Trust The Drum (Main Mix)- Marlon D.
Love, peace and House Beatz xx
